entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 1:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain becoming mixed with ice pellets near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
